Title: The Other Man
Writer: Aziz Ansari (created by), Alan Yang (created by), Joe Mande, Aniz Ansari, Zoe Jarman (story editor), Sarah Peters (story editor)
Actors: Aziz Ansari, Lena Waithe, Claire Danes, H. Jon Benjamin
Plot: Dev has the chance to hook up with a woman he meets at a party, but the opportunity comes with a few complications.
